about_the_game:
【Background】

《GODS EROTIC: Enthronement 》is set in a female-dominant world. 
Most of the kids are girls, and only a few boys who possess immortal bones would be accepted by the gods as apprentices. 

King Zhou was bewitched by the fox demon Daji, and the people were in dire straits. Ji Chang, the Overlord of the West, led the people to fight against the Shang Dynasty and finally established the Zhou Dynasty. Meanwhile, the immortal realm encounters a calamity that occurs once in 1, 500 years, and three religions jointly established "The Investiture of the Gods," confer divinity to the qualified people, immortals, priests, and demons. 

The protagonist Taigong Wang receives his destiny to assist King Wen and King Wu of the Zhou Dynasty to defeat King Zhou and perform the task of conferring divinity. Players will embark on an adventure full of challenges and temptations in the fantasy world with Taigong Wang. 

 

【Male Characters】

• Taigong Wang: The protagonist of 《GODS EROTIC》. 
He started to train in the Kunlun mountains at age 32 and apprenticed to YuanShi TianZun. Though he had not achieved immortality, he received his master's order to perform the investiture of gods and left the mountains. Taigong Wang does not excel at martial arts, but he has the all-mighty "magical whip," which spreads fear among all women. 
 

【Female Characters】

• Yang Jiang 

She wears light armor and holds a three-pointed and two-edged spear. She has long, straight, and dark blue hair and fair skin. Yuding Zhenren sent her to help Taigong Wang and test whether he was qualified to perform the task of conferring divinity. 
 

• Shen Gongbao 

She has tanned skin and wavy blond hair. She is dissatisfied with the task of entrusting Taigong Wang with the task of conferring divinity. She tries to take the investiture of gods from him and intends to let King Zhou destroy Xiqi.  
 

• Bo Yikao

She has long chestnut-colored hair. She paid treasures as a tribute to save her father but was framed by Daji, and when she was about to kill the king out of anger, she was stopped by Taigong Wang. She is now facing challenge trying to save her father, Ji Chang. 

 

• Bigan 

She devoted herself to serving the country. Facing the avenge from Daji, she needs Taigong Wang's help. 

 

• Huang Feihu

After her wife and sister died at the hands of King Zhou, she was determined to save the people and the country and joined Xiqi.
 

【Game mechanics and playstyles】

This is a match-3 casual game where players unlock stories and challenges by matching and go to each stage to take on the bosses as Taigong Wang to discover the truth behind the story. The in-game interactions will affect story progression, and your choices will decide the ending.

 

【Features】

  • Abundant CG: A full display of rich visuals with 18 basic CGs and over 100 CG differences.

  • Text: With a whopping 50, 000 in-game text (source language), players can dive into the story.

  • Multi-character interactions: There are fiery scenes of the protagonist with multiple female characters, and each character plays a significant role in the story.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: GODS EROTIC. enthronement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: 《GODS EROTIC: Enthronement 》is a match-3 casual game that combines ancient Chinese mythology and dating sim. Players will play as Taigong Wang, who receives his destiny to assist King Wen and King Wu of the Zhou Dynasty to defeat King Zhou and perform the task of conferring divinity.
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
